title: Should I Dump My Girlfriend?
description:
15-year-old John is wondering if it would be easier to break up with his girlfriend now since she will be moving away in a few months. - Dr. Laura: "Live life to its fullest instead of trying to shield yourself from pain."

At what age were you first "in love?" Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
